translations: n.[矿物]晶石；圆材（如桅、桁等）；争论；拳斗
n.（Spar）人名；（德）施帕尔；（法）斯帕尔

sentences.sentence: He entered the ring to spar a few one-minute rounds with an old friend.
sentences.translation: 他进了拳击场与一个老朋友练了几个一分钟回合的轻拳出击。

sentences.sentence: It makes as good a spar shear web as any material out there.
sentences.translation: 它可以制作出和其它材料一样好的抗剪腹板。

sentences.sentence: They always spar over trivial matters.
sentences.translation: 他们总是为一些小事而争吵。
